title: Disappointment as Portugal cut from UK travel 'green list' -- and no new countries added
content:
1. Disappointment as Portugal cut from UK travel 'green list' -- and no new countries added  CNN
  2. Holidays cancelled: Portugal added to travel 'amber list' by UK  Channel 4 News
  3. Covid: Portugal to be taken off green lists for UK holidaymakers  BBC News
  4. 'Safety first' behind Portugal removed from travel green list, claims transport secretary  Guardian News
  5. UK drops Portugal from safe travel list in major blow to airlines  Reuters
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
Disappointment as Portugal cut from UK travel 'green list' -- and no new countries added  CNN
Holidays cancelled: Portugal added to travel 'amber list' by UK  Channel 4 News
Covid: Portugal to be taken off green lists for UK holidaymakers  BBC News
'Safety first' behind Portugal removed from travel green list, claims transport secretary  Guardian News
UK drops Portugal from safe travel list in major blow to airlines  Reuters

localize.title: 英国の「グリーンリスト」からポルトガルが削除され、新たな国が追加されないことに落胆。
葡萄牙被从英国旅游 "绿色名单 "中删除，而且没有增加新的国家，这让人感到失望。
葡萄牙被從英國旅遊 "綠色名單 "中刪除，而且沒有增加新的國家，這讓人感到失望。
